message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $140.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product and would like to make a counteroffer of $130.
I appreciate your counteroffer, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $138.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $135 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $139. It's a great deal for you, and I think you'll love it.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $137 for the product.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $140, Bob. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $140.
